name: RandomVoice
0:
”Alexa launch random voice”
”Alexa ask random voice for a voice”
”Alexa ask random voice to give me a greeting”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random voice
des:
Ask for a Random Voice, and get greeted by somebody random.

Random Voice is a simple but fun skill to introduce you to random voices generated from text-to-speech.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Random Voice" or "Alexa, open Random Voice" to get a random greeting.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
